ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: i think it is 75%.  i get +120 to resists with psalms (this singing increase is almost certainly an oversight and will be fixed) and i think they do upper 60s
ygData.messageBody:
i think it is 75%. i get +120 to resists with psalms (this singing increase
is almost certainly an oversight and will be fixed) and i think they do
upper 60s normally, so something like 68 to 120 is 75%. good luck on the
scale. all 3 times we killed gorenarire she had a scale, phew. one for
each bard in the guild =)

Shada, new owner of dragon claw main gauche AND veldrak's shortsword...
which do i use!?


> Oh well. If Shada or anyone else with an SSS posts some
> instrument-tests I'm
> sure we'd all be curious to see how it does. =P
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> 57th Karaoke Singer, Veeshan
